headline: Emerson Extends Tender Offer to Accommodate S&P MidCap 400 Index Change
summary: Emerson (NYSE: EMR) today announced that it has extended the expiration of its tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of common stock of Aspen Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: AZPN) ("AspenTech") not already owned by Emerson to 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time on March 11, 2025. This one business day extension is to accommodate the settlement and tendering of shares of AspenTech common stock that may be sold due to the S&P MidCap 400 index change.
